IRS990.SpecialConditionDesc: IR2023159 HURRICANE IDALIA LATE FILING RELIEF
IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ASSIST THE ELDERLY, DISABLED AND DISADVANTAGED RESIDENTS OF MARION COUNTY TO MAINTAIN INDEPENDENT LIVING STATUS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ASSIST THE ELDERLY, DISABLED AND DISADVANTAGED RESIDENTS OF MARION COUNTY TO MAINTAIN INDEPENDENT LIVING STATUS.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDE TRANSPORTATION FOR MEDICAL, LIFE SUSTAINING, OR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES FOR RESIDENTS WHO DO NOT DRIVE OR OWN/HAVE ACCESS TO A VEHICLE. PROVIDE ALL ADA TRANSPORTATION FOR RESIDENTS OF MARION COUNTY. FUNDING PROVIDED MAINLY THROUGH SECTIONS 5310 AND 5311, TRANSPORTATION DISADVANTAGED, AND LOCAL COUNTY FUNDS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY CARE FOR THE ELDERLY PROGRAM PROVIDES HOME CARE SERVICES, INCLUDING ADULT DAY CARE, PERSONAL CARE, HOMEMAKER, HOME DELIVERED MEALS, EMERGENCY ALERT RESPONSE, CASE AID, AND CASE MANAGEMENT TO FUNCTIONALLY IMPAIRED ELDERLY PERSONS TO HELP THEM LIVE INDEPENDENT LIVES. CCE IS FUNDED THROUGH THE STATE OF FLORIDA GENERAL REVENUE FUND.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: TITLE IIIB IS A FEDERAL PROGRAM THROUGH THE OLDER AMERICANS ACT. IT PROVIDES PERSONS AGE 60 AND OVER TO RECEIVE HOMEMAKER SERVICES, TELEPHONE REASSURANCE AND EMERGENCY ALERT RESPONSE SERVICES TO HELP THEM LIVE INDEPENDENT LIVES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES INCLUDES TITLE IIIC-1, TITLE IIIC-2, TITLE IIIE, TITLE XXVI, ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE INITIATIVE, HOME CARE FOR THE ELDERLY, LOCAL SERVICES, CDBG SERVICE FACILITY, VOLUNTEER PROGRAM, MEALS ON WHEELS, PREFERRED CARE, MANAGED LONG-TERM CARE, AND MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES THROUGH LUTHERAN SERVICES FLORIDA.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: INSURANCE LOSS REIMBURSEMENT 41,402 GAS TAX REFUND 196,077 MISC 4,183 FUNDRAISING 24,220

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD DESIGNATED RESTRICTED FUNDS ARE AVAILABLE FOR ANY USE AS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SENIOR SERVICES IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3)OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION. ACCORDINGLY, THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS DO NOT REFLECT A PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES. SENIOR SERVICES IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO FEDERAL AND STATE EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2019. INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSESSED TO SENIOR SERVICES, AS A RESULT OF FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAX POSITIONS, ARE RECORDED AS AN OPERATING EXPENSE. FOR THE YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2022, THERE WERE NO INTEREST OR PENALTIES IN THE ACCOMPANYING FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES THROUGH LUTHERAN SERVICES FLORIDA.

OTHER PROGRAM SERVICES INCLUDES TITLE IIIC-1, TITLE IIIC-2, TITLE IIIE, TITLE XXVI, ALZHEIMER'S DISEASE INITIATIVE, HOME CARE FOR THE ELDERLY, LOCAL SERVICES, CDBG SERVICE FACILITY, VOLUNTEER PROGRAM, MEALS ON WHEELS, PREFERRED CARE, MANAGED LONG-TERM CARE, AND MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES THROUGH LUTHERAN SERVICES FLORIDA.

THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, FINANCE DIRECTOR AND BOARD TREASURER. IT IS THEN DISTRIBUTED TO BOARD MEMBERS THROUGH EMAIL OR HARD COPY FOR THOSE WITHOUT EMAIL. ANY CONCERNS ARE ADDRESSED AT THE NEXT SCHEDULED BOARD MEETING.
BOARD MEMBERS ABSTAIN FROM ANY VOTE IN WHICH THEY HAVE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST.
COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY BOARD OF DIRECTORS COMMITTEE WHO REVIEW SALARIES FOR COMPARABLE POSITIONS IN AREA.
